features: OPTIK PAPER – Premium bright white Optik Paper reduces ink bleed. The ability to write on both sides of every page maximizes usable space.
RULED PAGES – Business notebook includes 96 double sided 11-3/4" x 8-1/4" sheets, for a total of 192 notetaking pages. Perfect for meetings and reminders.
DURABLE HARDCOVER – Matte black hardcover notebook is textured to provide a sophisticated look and feel for the polished professional.
STYLISH BINDING – Red spine adds a bold accent. Pages are securely sewn into the casebound binding to provide lifelong protection for your notes.
SPECIAL FEATURES – Notebook has a red ribbon marker to hold your place.
body.description: Depend on a classic business notebook for your professional notetaking needs. Black n’ Red business notebook is a reliable choice for your important notes. Smooth and crisp Optik Paper is bright white and reduces ink bleed, allowing you to write on both sides of the page. Business notebook includes 96 double sided 11-3/4" x 8-1/4" sheets, for a total of 192 notetaking pages. Perfect for meetings and reminders. Matte black hardcover notebook is textured to provide a sophisticated look and feel for the polished professional. Red spine adds a bold accent. Pages are securely sewn into the casebound binding to provide lifelong protection for your notes. Notebook has a red ribbon marker to hold your place.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High Quality Paper Ultra smooth and bright white Optik Paper from Black n' Red is the ultimate writing experience. Hard Wearing Covers Distinctive and hard wearing hardback, poly and flexible covers that ensure your notes are well protected. Durable Bindings Choice of durable bindings, our casebound books are sewn bound and come with ribbon page marker for quick reference to notes. Our wirebound books are twin wire bound allowing the notebook to lay flat or fold back on itself for maximum comfort and flexibility.
Wherever you are, whatever you're doing

Environmentally Sound Our raw material sourcing, manufacturing methods and supply chain processes are independently recognized to give you confidence you are making an environmentally sound decision when you choose our notebooks. Selection of Sizes Pick from a selection of popular sizes to find a book to suit your every need. Sizes vary from Large (A4), Medium/Large (B5), Medium (A5) and Pocket (A6). Scribzee All of our large & medium sized wirebound notebooks are Scribzee enabled. With the free Scribzee app for your Android or iOS device, you can scan, save, and share your notes.

Poly Wirebound Notebook Hardcover Casebound Notebook Hardcover Wirebound Notebook Size 5-5/8" x 3-3/4" 8-1/4" x 5-7/8" 9-7/8" x 6-7/8" Sheet Count 70 Double-Sided Sheets 96 Double-Sided Sheets 70 Double-Sided Sheets Cover Material Poly Hardcover Hardcover Binding Wirebound Casebound Wirebound

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really enjoy these notebooks
reviews.reviewText: I tend to use a lot of notebooks and I've tried many different types. I recently found a great small one for my daily needs, but as a writer, I needed something larger. Especially when working on something more involved (like a book for example), I always prefer to have the outline written out physically so I can go back to it easily, work on it anywhere, keep organzed, jot down random thoughts, and so on.While I've tried others, none have really fit my needs (or they've been far too expensive for me to even consider), and I always end up going back to the same old convenience store spiral notebooks. The problem with those, as anyone who uses them will know, is the paper itself isn't the best quality, and with all the flipping back and forth I do when working on something, pages will end up ripping, falling out, etc., and it turns into a big mess.Now to this book. First off, the pages are really good quality. The paper is thick and I've been able to use both sides with absolutely no bleed through (using a gel ink rollerball pen). Using the same pen with other notebooks, there's no way I could use both sides of the paper and still be able to clearly read it.Another aspect I love about this is the hard cover. It's very sturdy and does a great job of protecting the book, making it even easier to carry around and use anywhere. I tried bending the book around the way you would with a spiral notebook if you were to work on only one page. I was able to, although I probably wouldn't suggest it because I assume it would wear out a lot quicker and weaken the backing. (I did notice the same company offers spirals. I haven't tried those yet but do intend to at some point).There are a few little extras that don't really influence how useful I find the notebook, but are nice to have. A ribbon to use for a bookmark, a date planner and table of contents area in the front, and a few maps in the back.I'm very satisfied with this book and glad I ordered two. I've already been using it to work on something on an almost daily basis, and have no complaints yet. Even better is the affordable price compared to some of the other better quality options available. I definitely intend to continue using these books and will likely try out a few others from this company in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality paper
reviews.reviewText: These are almost as I remember them from the long-ago. For me, the most important feature is that you can use it with fountain pens without any bleeding of the ink.The book itself is robust, I am sure it will last, and there are plenty of pages. The lines could be a little lighter without losing their efficacy but overall and excellent larger-format notebook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great journal -- size of standard paper
reviews.reviewText: I have kept journals for years, and I am picky about the size of the journal. I like the pages to be about the size of a regular piece of paper (8.5 x 11), so that I can tape in papers that are important or want to remember or whatever. I can't use smaller journals, of course, because they're too small to fit a piece of paper inside.I'd been buying my journals at Borders Bookstore. (I don't know if that store even exists anymore!) I bought all of these plain, cloth-covered journals that were just basic lined pages. They were great: they each had about 200 sheets and I could usually find them on sale for under $7. Well, years ago I saw they were clearing out their stock, so I bought all of their remaining journals on the shelves (at a great clearance price!).I'm finally about to run out of that supply of journals, and I've been shopping around for a while to find a new journal that I can start using. I wanted it to be about letter-size, and relatively cheap. I mean, it's just a blank book! I don't want something for professional use, just something to write in!I think this one will fit the bill. It's got nice thick covers and my test of the pages shows that my fountain pen won't bleed through the pages. Also, the price is good.It's certainly not the best looking journal. I don't think it would be appropriate in a professional setting, unless you're just using it for yourself, and not taking it around with you to meetings and such.OVERALL: Good, solid journal. Based on my shopping & comparing lots of different journals of comparable size, it's the best value. And -- the essential for any kind of journal or notebook -- your pen probably won't bleed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good paper quality, sturdy, weird graphic design.
reviews.reviewText: I've used a few different journals now, but this is going to be the one for a while.It has a thicker, better quality paper than the Blueline journals do - not a huge problem if you are using a ball-point pen, but this works so much better with fountain pens and strikethrough/ghosting.I don't mind the quotes too much like I see some complaining of, but the overall interior design should be cleaned up and dressed down a little and the quotes could really go, but the paper makes up for it, IMO. It IS a little off-putting if you are depressed and see the quotes, though. Like you are just trying to make it through the morning or day and here you go with Edison & Franklin. That part isn't great. NEVER GIVE UP written in a kind of desperate scrawled font that is trying to be dynamic and punchy is weird as well on the first page.If you are a stickler for number of pages, these guys are all over the place. The first batch I got was 192 pages - 96 writable sheets - but the current batch is 200 (100 double sided pages). I'd prefer 300/150 or more, so it is fine with me, but if you get used to numbering them and keeping track of daily writing, the surprise can be a little jarring.I think the only real downside for me is that the printed lines are just a little too wide - not college ruled - and that tends to make my writing sprawl. I don't love that.But good solid notebooks for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a writer
reviews.reviewText: My husband, received this as a gift from me when he was out of town. And loved the quality of this product and the paper. He keeps requesting me to buy more.
Só esperava que fosse um pouquinho maior, ainda assim me parece um ótimo caderno
Me gustó mucho la compra, es una libreta de buen tamaño, práctica y de buena calidad

reviews.reviewTitle: Best journal for fountain pens EVER !!!
reviews.reviewText: I have finally found my ideal journal for fountain pens (fp). I have been searching for best fountain pen journal for 30+ years and my quest is finally over. I have tested it with many fountain pens and many different inks - only one caused a very faint ghosting, yet barely visible (the cheap Amazon fountain pen and ink). This is now the only journal I will EVER buy. The only downside is that the brand is printed on the spine. Luckily, I label all my journals.Can’t recommend strongly enough for fountain pen users - this is the journal we’ve all been searching for.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen papel a buen precio 165 pesos
reviews.reviewText: La libreta es de muy buena calidad, yo la compré para practicar caligrafía y ha funcionado muy bien, aunque el papel es delgado, soporta muy bien la tinta, es realmente difícil que se traspase o como dicen los fresas aspiracionalistas, "sangre" si lo usan con plumas de gel o hasta plumones se comporta muy bien igual con plumas fuente, yo lo uso para plumas de inmersión o "dip pens" para que me entienda la minoría rapáz y sin ningún problema, solo venía la pasta un poco maltratada pero las hojas intactas. Pague por el cuaderno 165 pesos mexicanos o 8 dólares como dirían los progres neo petro economistas de café del vips.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice feeling in hand, looks "so classy" when taking notes, very executive.
reviews.reviewText: Love the overall fit in hand.Excellent build, great paper quality, and lovely inspiring messages throughout the the notebookEuropean size, a little bit different that your regular 8 1/2 x 11.It stands out because it's little bit taller.It just looks "so classy" when you are taking notes.Very executive!
